alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:21PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Latah, southwestern Benewah, northern Garfield, eastern Whitman and southeastern Spokane Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1221 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles south of Cheney to Colfax to near Pomeroy. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pullman, Moscow, Colfax, Palouse, Tekoa, Garfield, Albion, Rosalia, St. John, Oakesdale, Malden, Latah, Farmington, Princeton, Steptoe, Belmont, Diamond, Almota, Mayview, and Thornton. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 350 and 368. U.S. Highway 12 in Washington between mile markers 393 and 395. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 9 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
